snippet: Dan Higgins, a retired police officer, is looking for proof that a painting he bought at a tag sale for $500 is the work of Pieter de Hooch, a Dutch master from the 1600s.
abstract: Corey Kilgannon Character Study column profiles Dan Higgins, retired New York City police officer who obsessively combs yard sales for artwork in hopes of uncovering lost masterpieces.
lead_paragraph: Dan Higgins, a retired police officer, is looking for proof that a painting he bought at a tag sale for $500 is the work of Pieter de Hooch, a Dutch master from the 1600s.

headline.main: Tag Sale Painting, or Dutch Old Master?
